publ: by Justin Womack, founder of JMack Media LLC
name: MarketingGeeksAlert
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Listen to daily updates from the Marketing Geeks Podcast and its hosts, Justin Womack and Andros Sturgeon. You can just say "Alexa, what's my flash briefing". You can say "Alexa, stop" to exit anytime.

Now, true marketing aficionados like yourself can stay up to date on new podcast episodes and news alerts whenever we uncover deeply held secrets of the business and marketing worlds. You can rest assured that the Marketing Geeks will be there to break down the latest news in technology, VR, AR, social media, advertising, email marketing, and marketing in general. 

MarketingGeeksPodcast.com

We keep our fingers on the pulse of what's going on in the marketing and business world so that you don't have to. 

Guests on the Marketing Geeks Podcast have included John Lee Dumas of Entrepreneurs on Fire, Alex Berman of X23 Marketing, Dave Gerhardt of Drift, movie director Josh Tickell, and Cathy Hackl, Augmented Reality (AR) and Virtual Reality (VR) expert and LinkedIn Top Voice on Technology in 2018. 

Between our guests and ourselves, we provide the latest trends, tricks, and marketing tactics that will allow you to compete with the big guys in business and marketing. That's right, we are uncovering all of the secrets so that the playing ground is level and the small business owner can go head-to-head with the enterprise level company. Well, maybe not exactly, but that's the kind of spirit that we cultivate here on Marketing Geeks.

Justin Womack, co-host of this show, is the owner of JMack Media LLC, a Fiverr Pro in digital strategy and email marketing, a Certified Partner with Infusionsoft by Keap, and a keynote speaker that has spoken for companies like AIG, Marsh & McLennan, WEV, and more.

Andros Sturgeon is a C-level marketer and TEDx speaker that specializes in marketing strategy and future marketing trends.

Topics of our shows include copywriting, email deliverability, LinkedIn marketing and LinkedIn optimization, podcasting, Instagram marketing, Facebook marketing, YouTube video marketing and YouTube search ranking mastery, social media marketing, how to start a podcast, creating master online sales funnels, freelancing, affiliate marketing, landing page creation, lead magnet building, list building, principles of influence, building brand authority, establishing credibility, leveraging social proof, testimonials, creating masterful presentations, strategy session calls, sales calls, email authentication, DKIM, SPF, dmarc, email scrubbing, list scrubbing, virutal summits, webinars, product launches, chat bots, messenger bots, Facebook advertising, LinkedIn advertising, digital ads, Facebook ads, LinkedIn ads, Instagram ads, influencer marketing, influencers, Instagram ads, SEO, search engine optimization, keyword optimization, SEM, search engine marketing, Google Adwords optimization, Google display network optimization, YouTube ads, video ads, podcast ads, digital advertising, PPC, conversion ads, pixel, tracking pixel, Facebook pixel, awareness marketing, reach, impressions, CPM, cost per thousand impressions, and more.

We frequently work with specialized online marketing platforms like Mailchimp, Aweber, ConstantContact, ConvertKit, Klaviyo, ActiveCampaign, Infusionsoft, Ontraport, Magento, Maropost, Salesforce, SEMrush, Ahrefs, iSpionage, BuzzSumo, AppSumo, Amazon, Facebook, Twitter, YouTube, Vimeo, Instagram, IGTV, Periscope, Twitter Live, Facebook Live, LinkedIn, YouTube Live, LinkedIn Live, Instagram Live, Snapchat, TikTok, Fiverr, Fiverr Pro, Anchor, Libsyn, Podbean, Spreaker, DigitalMarketer, WebinarJam, EverWebinar, Zoom, Zoom Webinar, WebinarNinja, GoToWebinar, Clickfunnels, LeadPages, Audible, Kartra, Camtasia, Adobe Audition, Adobe Acrobat, GSuite, Google, Gmail, Mailshake, BriteVerify, Litmus, Wordpress, Squarespace, Memberium, PlusThis, Social Media Examiner, Social Media Marketing World, Traffic and Conversion Summit, Bitly, Cloudflare, Hotjar, and loads of other internet markeitng tools.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
